publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-875 Cathy Jamieson: Belmont Academy and Motorola Youth Parliament Competition—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Belmont Academy in Ayr, who won the Scottish Section of the Motorola Youth Parliament Competition and went on to take third place in the UK competition.

S1M-875 Cathy Jamieson: Belmont Academy and Motorola Youth Parliament Competition—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Belmont Academy in Ayr, who won the Scottish Section of the Motorola Youth Parliament Competition and went on to take third place in the UK competition.

S1M-875 Belmont Academy and Motorola Youth Parliament Competition (lodged on 17 May 2000) Christine Grahame*

S1M-875 Cathy Jamieson: Belmont Academy and Motorola Youth Parliament Competition—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Belmont Academy in Ayr, who won the Scottish Section of the Motorola Youth Parliament Competition and went on to take third place in the UK competition. Supported by: Irene Oldfather, Christine Grahame, Michael Russell*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
